channel.title: Web-Nginx on Liuzhongzhen的博客

item.title: Nginx 003nginx返回码
item.description: 常用返回码 200：服务器成功返回网页 403：服务器拒绝请求。 404：请求的网页不存在 499：客户端主

item.title: Nginx 002openResty中lua库查找路径
item.description: no field package.preload['zlib'] no file '/usr/local/sandai/apana/lua/libs/zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/sandai/apana/lua/zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/site/lualib/zlib.ljbc' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/site/lualib/zlib/init.ljbc' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/lualib/zlib.ljbc' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/lualib/zlib/init.ljbc' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/site/lualib/zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/site/lualib/zlib/init.lua' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/lualib/zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/lualib/zlib/init.lua' no file './zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/luajit/share/luajit-2.1.0-beta3/zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/share/lua/5.1/zlib.lua' no file '/usr/local/share/lua/5.1/zlib/init.lua' no file '/usr/local/services/openresty_httpsrv/luajit/share/lua/5.1/zlib.lua' no file

item.title: Nginx-001详细介绍
item.description: 转发 万字总结，体系化带你全面认识 Nginx 前言 作为一名前端开发人员，你是不是经常碰到领导让你上服务器去修改 Nginx
